December 12, 2023  —  Last night, Special Counsel Jack Smith asked the Supreme Court to decide Trump's claim that he is immune from any and all criminal prosecution for anything he did while in office.  That claim is central to Trump's defense; he has requested the charges against him be dismissed because of that immunity.
